name: Global Strike
storyline:
The adventure mode in global offensive is especially killing some zombies.
Just try it, there a lot of content and gun. The solo mode is huge and very difficult. Dont forget to watch your back!
summary:
Global Strike is a plugin-free, fully 3D browser-based shooter inspired by the classic era of FPS gaming.
Featuring realistic weaponry, massive environments, multiple frenetic game modes and classic graphics, Global Strike is bringing instant first-person-shooter gameplay to the webpage – no downloads required!
